channel.title: Help me: How do I fix wear an object is wield?
channel.description:
Okay, So I am working on my new server.. And I have tooo many items that aren't 'existing'..So, If anyone could show me how to make them exist and how to fix wear they are wield..
P.S. If someone could also show me how to fix the GodSword Stance? And any other tips on how to make a good server, or could help me code? :D
Pictures showing the errors:
[url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=18&u=15365539][img]http://i36.servimg.com/u/f36/15/36/55/39/screen10.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=19&u=15365539][img]http://i36.servimg.com/u/f36/15/36/55/39/screen11.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=20&u=15365539][img]http://i36.servimg.com/u/f36/15/36/55/39/screen12.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=21&u=15365539][img]http://i36.servimg.com/u/f36/15/36/55/39/screen13.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=22&u=15365539][img]http://i36.servimg.com/u/f36/15/36/55/39/screen14.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=23&u=15365539][img]http://i36.servimg.com/u/f36/15/36/55/39/screen15.png[/img][/url]

item.title: Help me: How do I fix wear an object is wield?
item.dc:creator: @Hordes Hordes
item.description:
@Hordes wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:10, topic:348856”]Open the Item class, look for the static integer array that corresponds with the item. Example, Helm of Niet the corresponding static integer array would be, hats, Armadyl Plate would be platebody… Or what ever it’s called, something along them lines.

Just add the item id of the item into the integer array.

Example,

public static int hats[] = {};

You’d add the item id into this array, for instance, say the item id was 1050, it would look like this.

public static int hats[] = {1050}; [/quote]

I did that, Compiled with the server off…
Still nothing. -.-

Read full topic
item.source: Help me: How do I fix wear an object is wield?

item.title: Help me: How do I fix wear an object is wield?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Open the Item class, look for the static integer array that corresponds with the item. Example, Helm of Niet the corresponding static integer array would be, hats, Armadyl Plate would be platebody… Or what ever it’s called, something along them lines.

Just add the item id of the item into the integer array.

Example,

public static int hats[] = {};

You’d add the item id into this array, for instance, say the item id was 1050, it would look like this.

public static int hats[] = {1050};

Read full topic
item.source: Help me: How do I fix wear an object is wield?

item.title: Help me: How do I fix wear an object is wield?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Hordes, post:8, topic:348856”][quote author=mmaKush link=topic=445229.msg3269303#msg3269303 date=1279081341]
What you basically do is exactly what Fridder said, you just add the item ID in the appropriate static variable.
[/quote]
I did that, But the items that I’ve shown you are still wield as weapons, Instead of what they’re ment to be…
Like Helm of Niet = Weapon instead of Helmet…
Armadyl Plate = Weapon instead of Body…
Ice Cape = Weapon instead of a Cape…

I need a more specific or detailed tutorial on how to…[/quote]
Did you compile? then turn off server? then turn it back on when compiling is done? :o

Read full topic

item.title: Help me: How do I fix wear an object is wield?
item.dc:creator: @Hordes Hordes
item.description:
@Hordes wrote:

@Fridder, Thanks :]
I didin’t understand a bit of that…

then gloves, shield, hats, amulets, arrows, rings, bodies, legs, full helm, etc. Put the item id below it.. like this: [code] public static int hats[] = { 1050, ITEMID, ITEMID, ITEMID, ITEMID[/code] and at the end put a " };" so it would look like this: [code] public static int hats[] = { 1050, ITEMID, ITEMID, ITEMID, ITEMID };[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help me: How do I fix wear an object is wield?

item.title: Help me: How do I fix wear an object is wield?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

That’s easy
Go into ITEM.java then it says something like:

public static int capes[] = {

then

    public static int boots[] = {

then gloves, shield, hats, amulets, arrows, rings, bodies, legs, full helm, etc. Put the item id below it… like this:

public static int hats[] = { 1050, ITEMID, ITEMID, ITEMID, ITEMID
and at the end put a " };"
so it would look like this:

public static int hats[] = { 1050, ITEMID, ITEMID, ITEMID, ITEMID };
your welcome

Read full topic
item.source: Help me: How do I fix wear an object is wield?
